## MatchManager class

A match manager - to fetch and manage matches.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MatchManager implements BaseManager<Match> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Match](./shieldbow.match.md)
